verses.verse: וַיְצַ֤ו <WH6680> commanded מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses וְזִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> with the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying שָׁמֹר֙ <WH8104> Keep אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמִּצְוָ֔ה <WH4687> all the commandments אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> which I command אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> you this day

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> shall be on בַּיּוֹם֮ <WH3117> And it shall be on the day אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> when תַּעַבְר֣וּ <WH5674> when ye shall pass over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <WH3383> Jordan אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> giveth לָ֑ךְ וַהֲקֵמֹתָ֤ <WH6965> thee that thou shalt set thee up לְךָ֙ אֲבָנִ֣ים <WH68> stones גְּדֹל֔וֹת <WH1419> great וְשַׂדְתָּ֥ <WH7874> and plaister אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בַּשִּֽׂיד׃ <WH7874> and coat

וְכָתַבְתָּ֣ <WH3789> And thou shalt write עֲלֵיהֶ֗ן <WH5921> and אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֛י <WH1697> upon them all the words הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> of this law הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> you בְּעָבְרֶ֑ךָ <WH5674> when thou art passed over לְמַ֡עַן <WH4616> so אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which תָּבֹ֨א <WH935> that thou mayest go in אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֣יךָ ׀ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֗ אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> thee a land זָבַ֤ת <WH2100> that floweth חָלָב֙ <WH2461> with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ <WH1706> and honey כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֛ר <WH1696> hath promised יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> God אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1> of thy fathers לָֽךְ׃

וְהָיָה֮ <WH1961> become בְּעָבְרְכֶ֣ם <WH5674> Therefore it shall be when ye be gone over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <WH3383> Jordan תָּקִ֜ימוּ <WH6965> [that] ye shall set up אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲבָנִ֣ים <WH68> these stones הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> as אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> which I command אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> you this day בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> in mount עֵיבָ֑ל <WH5858> Ebal וְשַׂדְתָּ֥ <WH7874> them with plaister אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בַּשִּֽׂיד׃ <WH7874> shall coat

וּבָנִ֤יתָ <WH1129> And there shalt thou build שָּׁם֙ <WH8033> there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> an altar לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> an altar אֲבָנִ֔ים <WH68> of stones לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תָנִ֥יף <WH5130> thou shalt not lift up עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and בַּרְזֶֽל׃ <WH1270> [any] iron

אֲבָנִ֤ים <WH68> stones שְׁלֵמוֹת֙ <WH8003> of whole תִּבְנֶ֔ה <WH1129> Thou shalt build אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֖ח <WH4196> the altar יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God וְהַעֲלִ֤יתָ <WH5927> and thou shalt offer עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> on עוֹלֹ֔ת <WH5930> burnt offerings לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> thereon unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

וְזָבַחְתָּ֥ <WH2076> And thou shalt offer שְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> peace offerings וְאָכַ֣לְתָּ <WH398> and shalt eat שָּׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וְשָׂ֣מַחְתָּ֔ <WH8055> there and rejoice לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

וְכָתַבְתָּ֣ <WH3789> And thou shalt write עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאֲבָנִ֗ים <WH68> upon the stones אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֛י <WH1697> all the words הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> of this law הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise בַּאֵ֥ר <WH874> plainly הֵיטֵֽב׃ <WH3190> very ס

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> and the priests הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites אֶ֥ל <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> unto all Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הַסְכֵּ֤ת ׀ <WH5535> Take heed וּשְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> and hearken יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> O Israel הַיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> this day הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> This נִהְיֵ֣יתָֽ <WH1961> thou art become לְעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

וְשָׁ֣מַעְתָּ֔ <WH8085> Thou shalt therefore obey בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> and do אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹתָו֙ <WH4687> his commandments וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֻקָּ֔יו <WH2706> and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> which I command הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> thee this day ס
וַיְצַ֤ו <WH6680> charged מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> the same day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אֵ֠לֶּה <WH428> these יַֽעַמְד֞וּ <WH5975> These shall stand לְבָרֵ֤ךְ <WH1288> to bless אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֙ <WH5971> the people עַל־ <WH5921> on הַ֣ר <WH2022> upon mount גְּרִזִ֔ים <WH1630> Gerizim בְּעָבְרְכֶ֖ם <WH5674> when ye are come over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan שִׁמְעוֹן֙ <WH8095> Simeon וְלֵוִ֣י <WH3878> and Levi וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and Judah וְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> and Issachar וְיוֹסֵ֥ף <WH3130> and Joseph וּבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> and Benjamin

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> these יַֽעַמְד֥וּ <WH5975> And these shall stand עַל־ <WH5921> For הַקְּלָלָ֖ה <WH7045> to curse בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> upon mount עֵיבָ֑ל <WH5858> Ebal רְאוּבֵן֙ <WH7205> Reuben גָּ֣ד <WH1410> Gad וְאָשֵׁ֔ר <WH836> and Asher וּזְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> and Zebulun דָּ֥ן <WH1835> Dan וְנַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <WH5321> and Naphtali

וְעָנ֣וּ <WH6030> shall speak הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> And the Levites וְאָֽמְר֛וּ <WH559> and say אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> unto all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel ק֥וֹל <WH6963> voice רָֽם׃ <WH7311> with a loud ס

אָר֣וּר <WH779> Cursed הָאִ֡ישׁ <WH376> [be] the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יַעֲשֶׂה֩ <WH6213> that maketh פֶ֨סֶל <WH6459> [any] graven וּמַסֵּכָ֜ה <WH4541> or molten image תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> an abomination יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD מַעֲשֵׂ֛ה <WH4639> the work יְדֵ֥י <WH3027> of the hands חָרָ֖שׁ <WH2796> of the craftsman וְשָׂ֣ם <WH7760> and putteth בַּסָּ֑תֶר <WH5643> [it] in [a] secret וְעָנ֧וּ <WH6030> shall answer כָל־ <WH3605> all manner הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> [place] And all the people וְאָמְר֖וּ <WH559> and say אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> Amen ס

אָר֕וּר <WH779> Cursed מַקְלֶ֥ה <WH7034> [be] he that setteth light אָבִ֖יו <WH1> by his father וְאִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> or his mother וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> shall say כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> Amen ס

אָר֕וּר <WH779> Cursed מַסִּ֖יג <WH5253> [be] he that removeth גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> landmark רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour's וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> shall say כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> Amen ס

אָר֕וּר <WH779> Cursed מַשְׁגֶּ֥ה <WH7686> to wander עִוֵּ֖ר <WH5787> [be] he that maketh the blind בַּדָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> out of the way וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> shall say כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> Amen ס

אָר֗וּר <WH779> Cursed מַטֶּ֛ה <WH5186> [be] he that perverteth מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <WH4941> the judgment גֵּר־ <WH1616> of the stranger יָת֖וֹם <WH3490> fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֑ה <WH490> and widow וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> shall say כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> Amen ס

אָר֗וּר <WH779> Cursed שֹׁכֵב֙ <WH7901> [be] he that lieth עִם־ <WH5973> with אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife אָבִ֔יו <WH1> with his father's כִּ֥י <WH3588> because גִלָּ֖ה <WH1540> because he uncovereth כְּנַ֣ף <WH3671> skirt אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father's וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> shall say כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> Amen ס

אָר֕וּר <WH779> Cursed שֹׁכֵ֖ב <WH7901> [be] he that lieth עִם־ <WH5973> with כָּל־ <WH3605> any בְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> with any manner of beast וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> shall say כָּל־ <WH3605> any הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> Amen ס

אָר֗וּר <WH779> Cursed שֹׁכֵב֙ <WH7901> [be] he that lieth עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲחֹת֔וֹ <WH269> with his sister בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter אָבִ֖יו <WH1> of his father א֣וֹ <WH176> or בַת־ <WH1323> or the daughter אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> of his mother וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> shall say כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> Amen ס

אָר֕וּר <WH779> Cursed שֹׁכֵ֖ב <WH7901> [be] he that lieth עִם־ <WH5973> in חֹֽתַנְתּ֑וֹ <WH2859> with his mother in law וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> shall say כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> Amen ס

אָר֕וּר <WH779> Cursed מַכֵּ֥ה <WH5221> [be] he that smiteth רֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour בַּסָּ֑תֶר <WH5643> secretly וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> shall say כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> Amen ס

אָרוּר֙ <WH779> Cursed לֹקֵ֣חַ <WH3947> [be] he that taketh שֹׁ֔חַד <WH7810> reward לְהַכּ֥וֹת <WH5221> to slay נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> any דָּ֣ם <WH1818> bloodshed נָקִ֑י <WH5355> an innocent וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> shall say כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> Amen ס

אָר֗וּר <WH779> Cursed אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יָקִ֛ים <WH6965> [be] he that confirmeth אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> not [all] the words הַתּוֹרָֽה־ <WH8451> of this law הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> by לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to do אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> shall say כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> them And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> Amen פ
